unnormalised: Arre yaar, hi Dilleechem havamaan pishachem assa! Kal, 22/05/2024, sumaar 45 deg C aslem, ekdom sosonchich zainaaslem. Khabramni sanglaa 25/05/24-ak paus poddcheachi shakyeataa asa, punn sotakuch mhaan maka distaa tedna mhaan visvaas thevtaa. Met Dept. hameshaan chuktaach, na? Aasha asa, pudhlea satolleak thondd zaat, mhanje 28/05 mukheli. Thondd zataam porian gharachea bhitar AC full lavun ravtam, bhai!
normalised: Arre yaar, hi Delhi-chem havamaan pishachem assa! Kal, baavis May don hazaar chovis, tem chalis ani paanch degree celsius bhaxen aslem, ekdom asodhya. Khabramni sangla ki pavsachi shakyaataa assa panchvees May don hazaar chovisachek, pun khorench, maka dista ten'na hanv visvaas thevtam. D-e-p-t. sodanch chukichem asta, na? Asha kortaam, puchea hafta porent thondd zaunk zai, mhantaat baavis May uperant. Bhitar ravun A-C full blast-ar chalu thevtam tednaa porent, bhai!
